summary: Data Engineer and Full‑Stack Developer experienced in building secure, scalable systems for government and enterprise use. Strong in relational data modeling, API/microservices integration, and analytics with Power BI, Tableau, and Crystal Reports. Adept at turning complex requirements into intuitive UIs and automated, auditable data workflows aligned with GDPR/CCPA.

jobs.title: Senior Data Engineer & Full-Stack Web Developer
duties: Developed secure, scalable applications handling PII in alignment with GDPR and CCPA.
Designed and optimized relational databases for performance, security, and integrity.
Integrated APIs and microservices across on‑prem and cloud services with staged Excel export workflows for rapid analysis and prototyping.
Built automated Excel data export/reporting pipelines for validation and client deliverables.
Developed solutions with Python, JavaScript, and HTML; created dashboards in Power BI, Tableau, and SAP Crystal Reports.
Gathered requirements with clients and delivered intuitive GUIs to improve efficiency.
Collaborated cross‑functionally to deliver tailored solutions improving processes and adoption.

jobs.title: Senior Departmental Information Systems Coordinator
duties: Administered on‑prem and cloud enterprise databases ensuring integrity and uptime.
Created complex SQL for reporting and compliance across Adult and Juvenile Divisions.
Built Power BI dashboards to surface real‑time KPIs and improve visibility.
Supported and trained users on critical systems including institutional control systems and contingency procedures.
Maintained and integrated on‑prem and SaaS platforms for forms, storage, and retrieval.
Coordinated upgrades with IT and business teams; resolved technical issues and optimized performance.
Led analysts, authored technical requirements, and implemented process improvements.

jobs.title: SCADA Systems Programmer
duties: Designed and implemented SCADA systems for water treatment operations automation.
Integrated SCADA data with relational databases for real‑time insights and reporting.
Automated processing using Python and SQL to reduce manual tasks.
Partnered with engineering to deliver custom solutions on time.
Developed client‑facing reports and dashboards for real‑time metrics.
Produced technical documentation and user manuals to streamline training and support.

jobs.title: Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA) Technician
duties: Programmed and installed SCADA systems to improve real‑time data collection.
Automated SCADA‑to‑database integrations and streamlined reporting.
Managed multiple SCADA projects to meet specifications and deadlines.
Created technical documentation and user guides for operations and maintenance.

education: B.S. in Computer Science, University of California, Santa Cruz (May 2024)
certificates: University of Santa Cruz B.S. Degree in Computer Science (certified graduation date May 2024)
California Law Enforcement Telecommunications System (CLETS) Certification
CRYSTAL REPORTS for SAP BUSINESS ONE MASTERY (Udemy)
SQL QUERY FOR SAP BUSINESS ONE (Udemy)
